rukus.text: Mulina lya Allah, Jwaukoto wejinji, Jwachanasa channope
Lumbili losope lwene alapikwe Allah, M'mbuje jwa iwumbe yosope
Kwele Jikape tukwagalagatila, soni Kwele Jikape tukwaŵenda chikamuchisyo
Litala lya aŵala ŵanya ŵamwapele chindimba, ngaŵaga ŵaŵatumbililidwe (aŵala ŵaŵaimanyi yakuona nikuileka), kapena ŵaŵasokonechele (aŵala ŵaŵailesile yakuona ligongo lya ujinga ni kupotela)
